message.content:
I need to identify and extract the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see that under "Cash Flow from Investing Activities", there is a line item "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with a value of 0.00 dated 2024-02-05.

This "Purchase of Fixed Assets" line represents the cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets. Since the value is 0.00, it means no cash was spent on acquiring fixed assets during this period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '0.00'} }
```
